projects.title: Toxic Colors
projects.description: Some colors are brightly alive, while some mean dead silence.

projects.title: Violent Deaths
projects.description: The day you wasted today is the tomorrow that someone who died yesterday so badly wished for.

projects.title: Soil for Survival
projects.description: The light shineth in darkness, and the darkness comprehended it not.

projects.title: Vacuous Truth
projects.description: Nothing is an absolute reality; all is permitted.

projects.title: Little Big Worlds
projects.description: Great music has the faintest notes. The great form is without shape.
